org.haldean.chopper
Class MakePicture

java.lang.Object
  org.haldean.chopper.MakePicture
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, Receivable
public final class MakePicture
extends Object
implements Constants, Receivable

Interfaces with the camera to obtain preview frames and to take high-quality pictures.

May send the following messages to registered Receivables:

 IMAGE:
       AVAILABLESIZE:<width>:<height>
       FRAMESIZE:<width>:<height> (as a reply to IMAGE:GETPARAMS)
May receive the following messages from Chopper components: 
 IMAGE:
       SET:SIZE:<width>:<height>
       AVAILABLESIZES
       GETPARAMS

Author:
Benjamin Bardin

Method Detail

getBufferCopy

public byte[] getBufferCopy()
Gets a copy of the last preview frame.

Returns:
The frame copy.

getFrameSize

public int[] getFrameSize()
Obtains the current preview frame size.

Returns:
An array containing the size. Index '0' is the current width, index '1' is the current height.

getPersistentThreadInstance

public PersistentThread getPersistentThreadInstance()
Obtains the thread that runs the MakePicture routines. On first call to this method, the PersistentThread is created. But since two or more instances of MakePicture should not be run concurrently, subsequent calls to this method return only that first thread.

Returns:
The PersistentThread that runs MakePicture.

getPreviewFormat

public int getPreviewFormat()
Obtains the image format used for preview frames.

Returns:
The format.

Returns:
The new-ness of the frame.
